Disease.content:

Paragraph: The major determinant of the symptoms may have been dopamine / serotonin imbalance in the central nervous system .

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

| Disease |
| --- |
| Dopamine imbalance |
| Serotonin imbalance |

These two entities are clearly diseases or conditions associated with an imbalance of dopamine and serotonin respectively in the central nervous system.
